event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: Schedule a repair procedure to replace the affected component, the identity of which can be determined by using fmdump -v -u <EVENT_ID>.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: The ultraSPARC-T2plus Coherency Interconnect has detected a fatal internal problem.
event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item:
The Message ID:  %MSGID% indicates an ultraSPARC-T2plus Coherency Interconnect has detected a fatal internal problem. There will have been a system reset. The nature of the fault does not allow an automated attempt to disable the affected resource.

Use the command  fmdump -v -u <EVENT_ID>  with the  <EVENT_ID>  from the PSH console message to locate the suspected faulty components. 

 
# fmdump -v -u 39bc195a-1f03-ef2b-b2a6-938819ce7470
TIME                 UUID                                 SUNW-MSG-ID 
Sep 02 10:49:45.5398 39bc195a-1f03-ef2b-b2a6-938819ce7470 SUN4V-8001-QC 
 100%  fault.asic.ultraSPARC-T2plus.interconnect.opu-u 

       Problem in: hc://:product-id=SUNW,T5440:chassis-id=0704BB5053:server-id=wgs40-49/motherboard=0/interconnect=1 
          Affects: hc://:product-id=SUNW,T5440:chassis-id=0704BB5053:server-id=wgs40-49/motherboard=0/interconnect=1 
              FRU: hc://:product-id=SUNW,T5440:chassis-id=0704BB5053:server-id=wgs40-49:serial=2A013E:part=501778312/motherboard=0 
         Location: MB

In the example above, the FRU is the motherboard. Also note the FRU part number and location is included: 

part=501778312

Location: MB
event_registry_properties.name: impact
response
title
event_registry_properties.item: ultraSPARC-T2plus Coherency Interconnect OPU subsystem fault
